trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the key specified for accessing an element in a collection does not match any key in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 當為存取集合中的項目所指定的索引鍵與集合中的任何索引鍵都不相符時，所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException> is thrown when an operation attempts to retrieve an element from a collection using a key that does not exist in that collection.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException>作業嘗試使用不存在這個集合中的索引鍵從集合擷取元素時，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_KEYNOTFOUND, which has the value 0x80131577.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException> 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_KEYNOTFOUND，0x80131577 的值。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException> class, see the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException>類別，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException" /> class using default property values.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設的屬性值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "The given key was not present in the dictionary."
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如 「 指定的索引鍵是否不在字典中 」。

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException> 類別執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述錯誤的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException" /> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 參數的內容必須能讓人了解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException> 類別執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />，包含所擲回之例外狀況的相關序列化物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 包含有關來源或目的端內容資訊的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException" /> class with the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息和造成這個例外狀況原因的內部例外狀況參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException> 類別執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 內部例外狀況參考。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。
